intro_text: r_c wanders past an old badger sett in the roots of a hazelnut tree, only to freeze. There's new scent here, acrid and sour.

Heart pounding, r_c sprints back to camp to warn everyone.

Feeling ever so alone on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} solo patrol, r_c carefully sniffs around the mouth of the burrow, but after a few moments, realizes that the scent is relatively weak. A badger was here, no doubt about it, but it doesn't seem to have taken up residence. This will be important information to report back at camp.

r_c carefully approaches the burrow, trying to figure out if there's anything new inside.
